article_title: The 10 Worst Cities for Middle Class Families
article_text:
10. Las Vegas, Nevada

To be fair, Sin City may not be aiming to be a hot spot for families looking to settle down. The city offers less than half of the 574 middle class job types evaluated by Chapman University, the lowest percentage in the country.
